title: Flexicar
description: Flexicar is a modern, responsive landing page for a fictional car rental service. It showcases clean design, smooth layout, and a strong focus on accessibility and mobile-first responsiveness — all built using only HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

title: Meme Catalog
description: Meme Catalog is a responsive web application that allows users to explore, view, and manage a collection of memes. Built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS and HeroUI, the app features an interactive table view and card view, complete with editing modals and real-time form validation.

title: Spider - Man Hero Page
description: A responsive heroine page inspired by the style of Spider-Man: No Way Home. The project was created with a focus on modern design, animation, a mobile-first approach, and optimization for different screens.

title: Web Studio
description: This is my first educational project — a multi-section landing page for a fictional web studio. It was built from scratch using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focusing on the fundamentals of responsive layout, semantic structure, and basic DOM interactions.
